items.name: Emily Thompson

items.name: David Lee

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about the AI Video Generator

items.title: What types of videos can be generated?
items.description: Our AI can create a range of video types including promotional clips, social media content, educational videos, and more, based on your provided script or concept.

items.title: Is there a cost to use the video generator?
items.description: Absolutely! Each user enjoys 30 free video generation credits daily. Additional credits can be earned through participation or memberships that unlock more features.

items.title: Can I use generated videos for commercial projects?
items.description: Yes, users with a subscription can use generated videos for commercial purposes while free-tier users are limited to personal projects.

items.title: How is user privacy maintained?
items.description: All video creation happens directly on your device using secure processing methods, ensuring your scripts and videos are never shared or stored externally.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Beautiful Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now to see how easily you can bring your ideas to life. No sign-up required.
